item.title: TikTok Video Editor - Create Viral Videos with AI and Original Voiceovers - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I'm seeking a skilled TikTok video editor with a creative vision. I will provide you with:

Professionally recorded voiceovers
Raw video footage
Access to Midjourney AI for generating visuals
Your role will be to:

Use Midjourney to generate eye-catching visuals based on the voiceovers and footage
Assemble and edit all elements into polished, engaging TikTok videos
Incorporate text overlays, transitions, music, and other effects to enhance the videos
Optimize videos for the TikTok platform to maximize engagement
If you have experience with video editing, a creative eye, and are familiar with Midjourney and TikTok trends, I'd love to hear from you. Please share your portfolio and relevant experience.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video

item.title: Color Grading for Unreal Engine Project - Upwork
item.description:
I have a music video that we are finishing up now inside unreal engine and we are doing the lighting within Unreal Engine.

I need somone to color grade a 4 seconds or so long so we can try to get it to match the Avatar The Way Of Water Color Grading.

We can relight and export the scene any way you need in order to get the same quality, color and depth.

Here is a video showing the types of footage we have and the types of Color Grading we are looking for.

Please provide your initial price to do the short test 4 second versinon to make sure we can get the quality, then we can move to the full project and you can quote on that separately.

item.title: Seeking motion graphics specialist / video and audio editor to prepare YouTube video - Upwork
item.description:
I have prepared a 15-minute video talk intended for a YouTube audience. It’s a pitch for an amendment to the U.S. Constitution, calling for a regular Constitutional Convention.

My wife has recorded me giving the talk from my home office. However, on a parallel track, I need an Upwork contractor to produce:

1) relevant B-roll, including stock photos and/or footage, so there is visual variety and the audience doesn’t need to look at me reading a script on a continuous basis;

2) explanatory graphics in a few places, making it easier for the audience to understand such elements as how Convention delegates are selected and how amendment proposals are developed; and

3) a custom thumbnail featuring the title.

The contractor will then merge the graphics with the audio / video to create the final product.

I’m not an expert on pricing a project like this, so please compete on price, as well as offering your proposal.

I’m happy to keep in touch via e-mail, phone, or video communications.

Attached is the script. Here's the link to a sample of my footage: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1txLGjdrlqoLixqChHa7BE4RTYc6NUxG1/view?usp=sharing

It's a low-resolution video.  A high-resolution file will be available later.

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Video Editor – Bring Creativity to Life with AI & Original Footage - Upwork
item.description:
I'm launching a new TikTok channel combining eye-catching AI-generated visuals (using Midjourney) with original video content. I'm seeking a skilled video editor to transform my raw materials into engaging, viral-worthy TikTok videos.


I'll provide all the building blocks:

Scripts: Detailed scripts to guide your editing process
Voiceovers: Professionally recorded voiceovers

AI-Generated Visuals: Access to Midjourney for stunning images and animations

Original Footage: Raw video footage shot by me
Your mission: Transform these elements into mesmerizing, share-worthy TikTok videos.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit Like a Pro: Edit and enhance the raw video footage to create a seamless and engaging experience.

Integrate AI Magic: Incorporate the provided AI-generated visuals into the video to create a unique look and feel.

Script to Screen: Bring the scripts to life by structuring the videos for maximum impact and viewer retention.

Sound Enhancement: Add the provided voiceovers and select appropriate music and sound effects to create a polished audio experience.

Trend Spotter: Stay ahead of the curve by incorporating the latest TikTok trends and editing styles.

Skills and Qualifications:

Editing Expertise: Mastery of video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).

Creative Flair: Ability to create visually compelling content that resonates with TikTok's audience.

Technical Acumen: Experience working with AI-generated visuals and incorporating them seamlessly into videos.

Adaptability: Openness to experiment with different editing techniques to create a unique style for the channel.

TikTok Guru: Deep understanding of TikTok's format, trends, and audience preferences.

To Apply:

Please submit your proposal with the following:

Portfolio: Links showcasing your video editing prowess, especially examples demonstrating your creativity and ability to work with diverse materials.

Experience: Briefly describe your experience with video editing, working with AI-generated visuals, and creating content for social media.


Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video
Skills: TikTok Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a couple of UGC Content Creators to generate engaging and authentic user-generated content for my client. The client makes products that elevate the gifting experience. Think shredded paper, gift bags, bows, treat bags, etc.

The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for visual storytelling and an understanding of current trends in content creation.

I'm starting with one small project that should be quite fast and straightforward. If this project works out, I have many more.

This first piece of content is a simple video demonstrating one of the products. It will include:

-Demonstrating how to "make" the finished product,
-Step-by-step instructional text overlay
-Background music
-You can narrate the steps if you like, but not required. If you choose to narrate, DO NOT use a computer generated voice.

The finished product will be about 15 seconds. The client and I will provide feedback for 2 to 3 rounds of edits on things like music choice, caption editing, tone of voice, background.

To be selected, please provide links to your video portfolio or links to 3 to 4 pieces of work you would like to showcase.  We will quickly select the creators we want to move forward with and then provide product and reference samples of competitor videos. I do expect this project to move quite fast.

And like I said, we have a lot of video content to create, so ideally looking for someone we can engage regularly who becomes familiar with our product.



Budget: $75
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Demo Video, UGC, Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Demo Video, UGC, Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Ecommerce Photoshop Editing Project - Upwork
item.description:
Hey so super simple !

Check the video first: https://www.loom.com/share/dc6f5e9c05c34fe4b03f035553cb643f
IT NEEDS TO BE DONE TONIGHT BEFORE MIDNIGHT CANADA TIME (WITHIN 4 HOURS)

I have a fashion eccomere website and we are doing a photoshoot the things you need to do...

1) Size All Images to the correct size
2) Remove Dust & Dirt and any blemishes from clothes and skin
3) Make sure background is hexcode : #f6f6f7
4) Make sure model is the same size in each photo
5) Colour Grade photo so it looks like my example attach below

I need this done within 4 hours, as we launch our website tommorow.

I attached examples below

-----
Workload

3 Jean Product ) ( Each Product has 4 Images )
3 Trousers ( Each Product has 4 Images ) 4 Tops ( Each Product has 4 Images )
5 Shirts ( Each Product has 4 Images )
4 Shorts ( Each Product has 4 Images )
4 Hats
( Each Product has 4 Images )

Total 23 Products X 4 images = 92 to 100 Photos Roughly.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:11 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Product Photography, Photo Retouching, Image Editing, Fashion & Beauty
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Product Photography, Photo Retouching, Image Editing, Fashion & Beauty
Country: Canada

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
IF IT DOSEN'T MAKE ME LAUGH......I'LL PASS

Seeking a skilled YouTube video editor with a background in humorous content creation. The successful candidate will be responsible for transforming provided tech focused scripts (approximately 2-3 minutes) - product reviews etc and voiceover recordings into engaging, captivating videos. Key responsibilities include:

Compiling various types of footage including stock footage, social media clips, screenshots, movie segments, and interview footage.
Crafting seamless transitions between scenes.
Enhancing videos with sound effects and background music.
Incorporating text and titles for additional context and emphasis.
The initial workload involves producing 1-2 videos weekly, with scripts and voiceovers supplied in advance. This position offers the opportunity for a long-term collaboration, with potential for additional perks and benefits.

Key Qualifications:

Familiarity with YouTube's copyright policies.
Demonstrated experience in video editing for YouTube, preferably within the technology domain.
A portfolio displaying previous work, emphasizing scriptwriting capabilities.
A keen interest or background in technology.
Strong ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

Key responsibilities include:

Compiling various types of footage including stock footage, social media clips, screenshots, movie segments, and interview footage.
Crafting seamless transitions between scenes.
Enhancing videos with sound effects and background music.
Incorporating text and titles for additional context and emphasis.
The initial workload involves producing 1-2 videos weekly, with scripts and voiceovers supplied in advance. This position offers the opportunity for a long-term collaboration, with potential for additional perks and benefits.

Key Qualifications:

Familiarity with YouTube's copyright policies.
Demonstrated experience in video editing for YouTube, preferably within the technology domain.
A portfolio displaying previous work, emphasizing scriptwriting capabilities.
A keen interest or background in technology.
Strong ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 00:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Country: Canada

This role requires a creative individual with a strong understanding of social media trends and best practices.

item.title: YouTube Automation Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced YouTube Automation Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of YouTube algorithms, content strategy, and automation tools. You will be responsible for managing and automating various aspects of our YouTube channel to ensure consistent growth, engagement, and monetization.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement automation strategies to streamline video production, publishing, and promotion processes.
- Optimize YouTube SEO to improve video rankings and increase organic reach.
- Analyze YouTube analytics and other data sources to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for growth.
- Collaborate with the content creation team to ensure videos meet quality standards and align with our brand.
- Automate audience engagement processes, including comment moderation and response.
- Manage YouTube ads and monetization strategies to maximize revenue.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in YouTube automation and digital marketing.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a YouTube Automation Expert or similar role.
- In-depth knowledge of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and analytics.
- Proficiency with YouTube automation tools and software.
- Strong understanding of content creation and video editing processes.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Passion for creating engaging and educational content.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with AI-driven content generation tools.
- Familiarity with graphic design and animation software.
- Knowledge of other social media platforms and digital marketing strategies.
- Previous experience growing a successful YouTube channel.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:51 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Automation, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Automation, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Long-Form Video Creator Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video creator who is experienced in creating an engaging and impactful video for long-form video sales letter before. The video will last around 39 minutes and the project is to be completed within 2 weeks.

Here is an example of the type of video I'm looking to create: https://mysteryschoolcode.com/vsl/index_test.php

Your responsibilities includes having to:
- Create an engaging and impactful video sales letter using appropriate video clips or images
- Syncing of subtitles
- Addition of sound effects (where appropriate)
- Addition of background music (where appropriate)

You are also expected to provide daily updates, with completed work of 2-3 minute videos every day.

If interested, please express your interest and send me your portfolio on past work that you have done.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:39 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Adobe Photoshop, Videography, Animation

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled video editor to join our team and help us create engaging content for our Youtube channel. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of motion graphics and be able to produce videos similar to the style of magnetsmedia. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding animations and effects, and ensuring the final product meets our high-quality standards. If you have a passion for storytelling, an eye for detail, and the ability to bring concepts to life through video editing, we want to hear from you!

Example videos:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vzrUhpBwebA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fe2iQ1f-IYE

These are the same style of videos we are looking for. So make sure you are fully capable before applying.

Skills:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, after effect, Final Cut Pro,davinci, etc...)
- Knowledge of motion graphics
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to work within tight deadlines
- Excellent communication skills
- Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities

Budget:

Current budget is set to $150 (flexible depending on your skill)



Budget: $150
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a video editor and a voice-over artist for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
So, This is my channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkQjP85QVYQQAxkbqpJsYsg
I need a very skilled video editor to level up my content in order to compete with bigger channels in my niche.

example:
https://youtu.be/JQFQ4BHL8_g?si=Kiz6TTFb0mr-y9iT

We're looking for someone with the following requirements
- Must be fluent in English
- Fast turnaround time (3-5days)
- Fast response times
- Good understanding of YouTube retention (important)
- Ideally has expertise in storytelling (important)
- Add clips to give more context to the video
- Capacity for long-term work
- The budget is based on how skilled you are, and how much you charge for 10-12minutes.

I need a professional voice-over artist as well
- Must be fluent in English
- Fast turnaround time (24h)
- Fast responses
- $25 per 2000words

When applying, please provide us examples of previous work and YouTube videos you’ve worked or you will automatically be disqualified to work with us.

Start the proposal with (I READ IT ALL) so I know you've read everything.


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:25 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:English, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Storytelling
Skills: English, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Storytelling
Country: Morocco
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Web Design Showreel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create an engaging showreel of approximately 40 seconds to promote my clients web design service. We will provide you with the URLs of the websites that need to be featured in the showreel.

My client wants a video made just like this one with similar effects and transitions: https://youtu.be/2scPZ1U-KLk

The video should effectively showcase the design and functionality of our web designs, capturing the attention of potential clients. The editor will be responsible for selecting the best shots, adding creative transitions and effects, and integrating background music to enhance the overall impact. Attention to detail and the ability to deliver high-quality work within the given timeframe are essential.

Only apply if you have relevant experience with this style.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Creative storytelling
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Knowledge of transitions and effects
- Music integration

We are open to only individual freelancers. Start your proposal with "selfie" to be considered.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:25 UTC
Category: Web Design
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Restaurant Promo Video + Shorts for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, we are looking for someone who can edit restaurant commercials 60-90s For this project we are looking for a promotional restaurant commercial and some short social media promotional video x 3.

Please feel free to bid what you feel is necessary to make this job really look good.

We want to find someone who we can use on a regular basis as we plan on doing a few restaurant advertisements a week once we are fully ramped up.

Included in your pricing, please let us know what the commercial costs and how many social media video posts we can get along with that. If there is any thing else you include, let us know as well!

We want to make this collaborative so if there is extra you need from us to calculate or make this job look good, just let me know.

Please make sure to include past works of restaurant promotional videos of your own when responding.

Thanks,
Matthew

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Advertising, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Advertising, Video Editing
Country: United States
